analysis.description:
Reentrancy in RC.releaseTokensTo (/unique_chucks/36/0x94e332cc102a02bad6ce2e644ab88f6025bc643f.sol#234-253):

TokenSale.addMeByRC uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(tx.origin == owner) (/unique_chucks/36/0x94e332cc102a02bad6ce2e644ab88f6025bc643f.sol#393-394)

RC.fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0x94e332cc102a02bad6ce2e644ab88f6025bc643f.sol#280-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenSaleContract.claim(msg.sender,addTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/36/0x94e332cc102a02bad6ce2e644ab88f6025bc643f.sol#299-301)
